subject: Steroids
Athletics and Sports
Olympic Games
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: Dick Pound is in his sixth year as chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, established in 1999 after a doping scandal shook the 1998 Tour de France.
snippet: Dick Pound is in his sixth year as chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, established in 1999 after a doping scandal shook the 1998 Tour de France.
